venue.address_1: at the intersection of Charles St and Boylston St
venue.name: Boston Common - Charles Street side

item.description: This week please come and celebrate Boston Frisbee's 4th year anniversary.  We have a fun-filled evening planned for you all with food, ultimate, and special mini-games.  Even if you don't feel like running around much there will be plenty of cake and goofiness to go around...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the flying frisbees - usually either in the baseball fields or the parade grounds north of the baseball fields.
item.name: Boston Frisbee 4th Year Anniversary Party @ Boston Common
